article.title: Telephonics to Provide Encrypted Aircraft Wireless Intercom System
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Telephonics Corp., Farmingdale, N.Y., was awarded a $33,189,984 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of the Encrypted Aircraft Wireless Intercom System. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
